personalized video as well as home

speaking for just the X1 platform form
we started using AWS seriously about a
year ago to extend our Data Center

and direct connect it gives us highspeed
and very secure access for extending the
several data centers that we already
have but it's really important that
we're able to scale quickly and that's

developers and testers have a voracious
appetite for ec2 instances and storage
you have to think of the X1 platform
almost like a startup several years ago
it was a big radical idea to
dramatically change how we deliver

hard to predict success so AWS was a
perfect solution to help us anticipate
scale that we couldn't
necessarily invest in at that time
because we chose to use AWS it is made
scaling the X1 platform really super
easy we don't have to justify capex up

demand requires it once in
AWS you can begin to take advantage of
the Advanced Services that are available
Beyond infrastructure as a service and
that's really
interesting things like red shift SNS
sqs S3 EMR are all there pretty much at
a click and so an Innovative developer
can decide to take on a project on her
own
and envision what would this be like

within a few minutes she could prototype
